page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA
page.content: {Warrington-Runcorn New Town Warrington New Town has been developed over the past decade to create a big new industrial centre, which is linked to other places by the M6 and M62. Warrington-Runcorn has proved to be successful in providing housing and employment for the people in the North-West. In early 1985 unemployment was reduced as new businesses brought 620 jobs to the New Town. Achievements by the New Town developers so far include the creation of over 23,000 jobs by 405 new companies. The New Town Development Corporation estimate that a science park now under construction will create up to 3,000 jobs. It is predicted that Warrington-Runcorn will become Britain's leader in the high technology industry.
